metrics.name: PO spend per supplier in Ariba
metrics.description: Average PO spend transacted with supplier on Ariba
metrics.signalFragment: SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)" ) / (COUNT( DISTINCT "PO Item Supplier ID" ))

metrics.name: % of PO spend created from Contracts, Catalog and Blanket Purchase Order
metrics.description: PO spend associated with Contracts, Catalog and Blanket Purchase Order as a % of total spend originating from Ariba
metrics.signalFragment:
(
  SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER ( 
      WHERE "PO Item Contract ID" IS NOT NULL
      AND "PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog' , 'NonCatalog')
      ) 
  +
  SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER ( 
      WHERE "PO Item Contract ID" IS NULL
      AND "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog'
      ) 
)
/   
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER (
  	WHERE "PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog' , 'NonCatalog')    	
	)    
* 100

metrics.name: % of PO spend on Contracts
metrics.description: PO spend associated with contract as a % of total spend originating from Ariba
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER ( 
	WHERE "PO Item Contract ID" IS NOT NULL
	) 
/   
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER (
  	WHERE "PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog' , 'NonCatalog')    	
	)     
* 100

metrics.name: Process compliance
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ptp_compliant_event_sequence})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: % of PO Spend on Non Catalog
metrics.description: PO spend associated with non catalog as a % of total spend originating from Ariba
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER (
  	WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog'
	) 
/   
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") 
* 100

metrics.name: Average invoice payment time
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_clearing_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_receipt_events}))
   )

metrics.name: % of PO Spend on Catalog
metrics.description: PO spend associated with non catalog as a % of total spend originating from Ariba
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER (
  	WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog'
	) 
/   
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") 
* 100

metrics.name: Average Ariba Approval Invoice Cycle Time in Days
metrics.description: Average Time Taken from Invoice Submission to Invoice Approvalâ€‹

metrics.name: Average confirmation time for purchase requisitions
metrics.description: Average time needed to confirm a purchase requisition by creating a purchase order
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${po_creation_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${pr_creation_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Average cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event

metricsVariables.name: invoice_receipt_events
metricsVariables.description: Events indicating the receipt of an invoice, for example 'Record Invoice Receipt', 'Create FI Invoice'

metricsVariables.name: pr_creation_events
metricsVariables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase requisition item, for example 'Create PR Item'

metricsVariables.name: ptp_compliant_event_sequence
metricsVariables.description: Sequence of events that fulfil the compliance requirements of a Procure-to-Pay process, for example ^ 'Create PO Item' ~> 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt') ~> 'Clear Invoice' $
metricsVariables.value: ^ 'Create PR item' ~> 'Approve PR item' ~> 'Create PO Item' ~> 'Receive invoice' ~> 'Reconcile invoice' ~>  'Approve Invoice' ~> 'Pay Invoice' $

metricsVariables.name: po_creation_events
metricsVariables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase order, for example 'Create PO Item'

metricsVariables.name: invoice_clearing_events
metricsVariables.description: Events indicating the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Clear Invoice'

children.name: Key KPI
Summary
Total No of Cases
No. of Catalog Purchases
No. of Non Catalog Purchases
No. of Tax Payments
% of Catalog Cases

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
(COUNT("Catalog Cases")/COUNT("All Cases")) * 100 AS "% of Catalog Puchases"
FROM
(
 SELECT DISTINCT
  "CASE_ID" AS "All Cases",
  CASE WHEN "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog' THEN "CASE_ID" ELSE NULL END AS "Catalog Cases"
 FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
)AS SUB
--WHERE ((SELECT LAST (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', END_TIME))) >= DATE '2022-01-01' AND (SELECT FIRST (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', END_TIME))) <= DATE '2022-06-30') AND ("PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog'))

children.name: % of Non Catalog Cases

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
(COUNT("Catalog Cases")/COUNT("All Cases")) * 100 AS "% of Catalog Puchases"
FROM
(
 SELECT DISTINCT
  "CASE_ID" AS "All Cases",
  CASE WHEN "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog' THEN "CASE_ID" ELSE NULL END AS "Catalog Cases"
 FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
)AS SUB
--WHERE ((SELECT LAST (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', END_TIME))) >= DATE '2022-01-01' AND (SELECT FIRST (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', END_TIME))) <= DATE '2022-06-30') AND ("PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog'))

children.name: % of Catalog Cases with Contracts

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE "PO Item Contract ID" IS NOT NULL AND "PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog')) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE "PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog')) * 100 AS "% of Cases with contracts"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"

children.name: % of Catalog Cases without Contracts

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE "PO Item Contract ID" IS NULL AND "PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog')) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE "PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog')) * 100 AS "% of Cases with contracts"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"

PO Spend on Catalog Items

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM ("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER (WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog') AS "PO Spend on Catalog"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"

children.name: % of PO Spend on Catalog Items
% of PO Spend on Non Catalog Items
PO Spend on Non Catalog Items

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM ("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER (WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog') AS "PO Spend on Non Catalog"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"

children.name: Avg. PO Spend per Supplier
Total Spend Over Time by PO Line Item Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT
DATE_TRUNC('QUARTER', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Quarter", SUM ("PO Item Amount (INR)") AS "PO Item Amount (INR)",
"PO Item Line Type"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('QUARTER')
LIMIT 500

children.name: Total Spend Over Time by Business Unit

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
DATE_TRUNC('QUARTER', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Quarter",
SUM ("PO Item Amount (INR)") AS "PO Item Amount (INR)", 
"PO Business Unit"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('QUARTER')
LIMIT 500

children.name: % Catalog Spend Over Time by Business Unit

dataSource.query:
SELECT
DATE_TRUNC('QUARTER', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Quarter", 
SUM ("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER (WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog') / SUM ("PO Item Amount (INR)") * 100 AS "% of PO Spend on Catalog",
"PO Business Unit"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 1 ASC
FILL timeseries('QUARTER')
LIMIT 500

children.name: % Non Catalog Spend Over Time by Business Unit

dataSource.query:
SELECT
DATE_TRUNC('QUARTER', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Quarter", 
SUM ("PO Item Amount (INR)") FILTER (WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog') / SUM ("PO Item Amount (INR)") * 100 AS "% of PO Spend on Catalog",
"PO Business Unit"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 1 ASC
FILL timeseries('QUARTER')
LIMIT 500

children.name: Total Purchase Amount by PO Business Unit

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM ("PO Item Amount (INR)") AS "Total PO Amount (INR)", 
AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST(END_TIME))) AS "Avg. Cycle Time",
"PO Business Unit" AS "PO Business Unit"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 1 DESC

--AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST(END_TIME))) AS "Avg. Cycle Time",
"Cost Center Id"  
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: Total Purchase Amount by PO Material (Top 10)

children.name: Avg. Cycle Time & Total PO Amount Paid by Month

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Month", 
--COUNT(CASE_ID) AS "No. of Cases",
SUM ("PO Item Amount (INR)") AS "Total PO Amount (INR)",
AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) -  (SELECT FIRST(END_TIME))) AS "Avg. Cycle Time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH')
LIMIT 500

No. of Cases & Avg. Cycle Time by Invoice Line Item Type (Top 10)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT "CASE_ID") AS "No .of Cases",
AVG("Cycle Time") AS "Avg. Cycle Time",
"Invoice Item Type"
FROM
--FLATTEN(
 (
  SELECT 
  CASE_ID,
  (SELECT LAST (END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME)) AS "Cycle Time", 
  "Invoice Item Type" 
  FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
  --WHERE (SELECT LAST("Invoice Item Type")) IS NOT NULL
  ) AS SUB
--)
WHERE "Invoice Item Type" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 3 
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: No. of Cases & Avg. Cycle Time by Invoice Reconciliation Status

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT "CASE_ID") AS "No .of Cases",
AVG("Cycle Time") AS "Avg. Cycle Time",
"Invoice Reconciliation Status"
FROM
--FLATTEN(
 (
  SELECT 
  CASE_ID,
  (SELECT LAST (END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME)) AS "Cycle Time", 
  "Invoice Reconciliation Status"
  FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
  --WHERE (SELECT LAST("Invoice Reconciliation Status")) IS NOT NULL
 ) AS SUB
--)
WHERE "Invoice Reconciliation Status" IS NOT NULL

 (

children.name: No. of Cases & Avg. Cycle Time by "Invoice Reconciliation Outcome

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT "CASE_ID") AS "No .of Cases",
AVG("Cycle Time") AS "Avg. Cycle Time",
"Invoice Reconciliation Outcome"
FROM
--FLATTEN(
 (
  SELECT 
  CASE_ID,
  (SELECT LAST (END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME)) AS "Cycle Time", 
  "Is Invoice Reconciled?" AS "Invoice Reconciliation Outcome"
  FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
  WHERE (SELECT LAST("Is Invoice Reconciled?")) IS NOT NULL
 ) AS SUB
--)
WHERE "Is Invoice Reconciled?" IS NOT NULL

children.name: No. of Invoices & Amount Paid by Currency

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT (DISTINCT "Invoice Id") AS "No. of Invoices", 
SUM("Invoice Item Amount Paid (INR)") AS "Invoice Amount Paid (INR)",
"Invoice Currency"
FROM (
SELECT 
  "Invoice Id",
  "Invoice Currency",
  "Invoice Item Amount Paid (INR)"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)) AS SUB
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: No. of Invoices & Amount Paid by Payment Terms

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT (DISTINCT "Invoice Id") AS "No. of Invoices", 
SUM("Invoice Item Amount Paid (INR)") AS "Invoice Amount Paid (INR)",
"Invoice Payment Terms" AS "Payment Terms"
FROM (SELECT "Invoice Id","Invoice Payment Terms","Invoice Item Amount Paid (INR)"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)) AS SUB
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: No. of Cases & Avg. Cycle Time by PO Supplier using Paper Invoice (Top 50)

dataSource.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
"PO Supplier",
COUNT("CASE_ID") AS "No. of Cases",
AVG("Cycle Time") AS "Avg. Cycle Time",
SUM(CASE WHEN "Invoice Amount" IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE "Invoice Amount" END) AS "Total Invoice Amount"
FROM
FLATTEN(
(
  SELECT 
  "CASE_ID",
  "EVENT_NAME",
  "PO Item Supplier ID" AS "PO Supplier",
  ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME))) AS "Cycle Time",
  (SELECT SUM("Invoice Item Amount Accepted") FILTER(WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve Invoice')) AS "Invoice Amount",
  (SELECT LAST("Invoice Submission Method") FILTER(WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Receive invoice')) AS "Invoice Submission Method"
  FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
  WHERE "PO Item Supplier ID" IS NOT NULL
 ) AS SUB1
)
WHERE "Invoice Submission Method" in ('PaperViaICS','Paper Invoice')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: No. of Cases & Avg. Cycle Time by PO Supplier using Electronic Invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
"PO Supplier",
COUNT("CASE_ID") AS "No. of Cases",
AVG("Cycle Time") AS "Avg. Cycle Time",
SUM(CASE WHEN "Invoice Amount" IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE "Invoice Amount" END) AS "Total Invoice Amount"
FROM
FLATTEN(
(
  SELECT 
  "CASE_ID",
  "EVENT_NAME",
  "PO Item Supplier ID" AS "PO Supplier",
  ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME))) AS "Cycle Time",
  (SELECT SUM("Invoice Item Amount Accepted") FILTER(WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve Invoice')) AS "Invoice Amount",
  (SELECT LAST("Invoice Submission Method") FILTER(WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Receive invoice')) AS "Invoice Submission Method"
  FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
  WHERE "PO Item Supplier ID" IS NOT NULL
 ) AS SUB1
)
WHERE "Invoice Submission Method" in ('Online')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

Analysis Notes
Avg Cycle Time

Avg. Cycle Time of Closed Cases with Rework

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Receive invoice')) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Create PO Item')))
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"

children.name: Avg. Cycle Time (Receive PO Item to Receive Invoice)

dataSource.query:

AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Receive invoice')) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Receive PO item')))
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"

children.name: Avg. Cycle Time (Receive Invoice to Approve Invoice)
Avg. Cycle Time (Approve Invoice to Pay Invoice)
Avg. Cycle Time Over Time

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
DATE_TRUNC('QUARTER', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Quarter", 
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME))) AS "Avg. Cycle Time", 
"PO Item Line Type"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 3, 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('QUARTER'), NULL, GROUP

SELECT 
DATE_TRUNC('QUARTER', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Quarter", 
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Create PO Item') - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Create PR item')) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Create PR to Create PO)", 
"PO Item Line Type"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"

children.name: Avg. Cycle Time (Create PO to Receive Invoice) over Time

DATE_TRUNC('QUARTER', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Quarter",

children.name: Process Discovery - Catalog
Process Discovery - Non Catalog
Consideration Points

blocks.text: Top-quartile organizations have extremely short requisition - to - order cycle time on an Avg 0.3days
-  Avg Cycle Time 8d 6h which is  high as compared to best in class
Industry Benchmarks for Average Requisition to Order Cycle Time for Catalog Requisition
Business Benchmarks as per Athena for Average Requisition to Order Cycle Time for Non Catalog Requisition
If Average cycle time shows an increasing trend then following can be considered:
2. Usage of SAP Ariba Mobile Application.
3. Revisiting Approval Strategy for reducing cycle time.

children.name: Cycle Time - Detailed
Summary

blocks.text: The Avg. Cycle Time for Non Catalog  purchases is 1.5 times of the Cycle Time  for Catalog Purchases.
The Avg. Cycle Time for Catalog purchases remains marginally lesser than the Non Catalog Purchases throughout the year.
The Business Unit 1000 has the highest Avg. Cycle Time in Q1 2022 and the business unit 5250 maintains a higher cycle time consistently.
The Business Unit 1010 has the highest Avg. Cycle Time for Catalog purchases in Q1 2022 following which it has no catalog purchases.
The overall purchases have the highest Avg. Cycle Time in Q4 2022.
The Business Unit 5250 has the highest Avg, Cycle Time of 124 Days 9 Hours.
The POs procuring the Material Number S0183 have the third highest number of cases (7050) and one of the highest cycle time (121 Days 11 Hours).

children.name: No. of Cases & Avg. Cycle Time by PO Item Line Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(CASE_ID) AS "No. of Cases",
AVG ((SELECT LAST ("end_time") - FIRST ("end_time"))) AS "Avg. Cycle time", 
"PO Item Line Type" 
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 25

children.name: Avg. Cycle Time Over Time by PO Item Line Type
Avg. Cycle Time over time by PO Business Unit

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
DATE_TRUNC('QUARTER', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Quarter", 
AVG ((SELECT LAST ("end_time") - FIRST ("end_time"))) AS "Cycle time", 
"PO Business Unit"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ((SELECT LAST (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', END_TIME))) >= DATE '2022-01-01' AND (SELECT FIRST (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', END_TIME))) <= DATE '2022-06-30') AND ("PO Item Line Type" IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY 3, 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('QUARTER'), NULL, GROUP
LIMIT 500

DATE_TRUNC('QUARTER', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Quarter", 
AVG ((SELECT LAST ("end_time") - FIRST ("end_time"))) AS "Cycle time", 
"PO Business Unit"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ((SELECT LAST (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', END_TIME))) >= DATE '2022-01-01' AND (SELECT FIRST (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', END_TIME))) <= DATE '2022-06-30') AND ("PO Item Line Type" IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY 3, 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('QUARTER'), NULL, GROUP
LIMIT 500

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(CASE_ID) AS "No. of Cases",
AVG ((SELECT LAST ("end_time") - FIRST ("end_time"))) AS "Avg. Cycle time", 
"PO Material Number" 
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: No. of Closed Cases & Avg. Cycle Time by PO Supplier (Top 25) & PO Item Line Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"PO Item Supplier ID", 
"PO Item Line Type",
COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "No. of Cases", 
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") AS "Total PO Amount",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME))) AS "Avg. Cycle Time",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve PR item') - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Create PR item')) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Create PR to Approve PR)",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Create PO Item') - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve PR item')) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Approve PR to Create PO)",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Receive PO item') - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Create PO Item')) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Create PO to Goods Receipt)",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve Invoice') - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Receive invoice')) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Receive Inv. to Approve Inv.)",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Pay Invoice') - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve Invoice')) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Approve Inv. to Pay Inv.)"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 3 DESC
LIMIT 25

children.name: No. of Closed Cases & Avg. Cycle Time by  Cost Center (Top 25) & PO Item Line Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Cost Center Id", 
"PO Item Line Type",
COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "No. of Cases", 
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") AS "Total PO Amount",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME))) AS "Avg. Cycle Time",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve PR item') - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Create PR item')) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Create PR to Approve PR)",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Create PO Item') - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve PR item')) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Approve PR to Create PO)",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Receive PO item') - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Create PO Item')) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Create PO to Goods Receipt)",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve Invoice') - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Receive invoice')) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Receive Inv. to Approve Inv.)",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Pay Invoice') - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve Invoice')) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Approve Inv. to Pay Inv.)"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 3 DESC
LIMIT 25

dataSource.query:

"PO Item Line Type"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 1 ASC

AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Pay Invoice')) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve Invoice'))) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Approve to Pay Invoice)",
"PO Business Unit"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 100

children.name: PO Amount & Cycle Time (Approve to Pay Invoice) by PO Business Unit

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM ("PO Item Amount (INR)") AS "PO Item Amount (INR)",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Pay Invoice')) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve Invoice'))) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Approve to Pay Invoice)",
"PO Business Unit"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 100

children.name: No. of Cases & Approve to Pay Invoice Time by Cost Center Id

columnConfigurations.columnAlias: Avg. Cycle Time (Approve to Pay Invoice)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "No. of Cases", 
"Cost Center Id", 
"PO Item Line Type",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Pay Invoice')) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve Invoice'))) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Approve to Pay Invoice)",
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") AS "Total PO Amount (INR)"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
GROUP BY 2,3
ORDER BY 2
LIMIT 100

children.name: No. of Cases & Approve to Pay Invoice Time by Bill To Location Id

columnConfigurations.columnAlias: Avg. Cycle Time (Approve to Pay Invoice)

dataSource.query:

COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "No. of Cases", 
"Bill To Location Id", 
"PO Item Line Type",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Pay Invoice')) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Approve Invoice'))) AS "Avg. Cycle Time (Approve to Pay Invoice)",
SUM("PO Item Amount (INR)") AS "Total PO Amount (INR)"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
GROUP BY 2,3
ORDER BY 2
LIMIT 100

children.name: Consideration Points

blocks.text: If Non Catalog spend is more then following can be considered:
1.  Adequate use Sourcing and Contract Operationalization.
3. Supplier Enablement strategy to be revisited.

children.name: Consideration Points

blocks.text: If Catalog spend is less then following can be considered:
1.  Adequate use Sourcing and Contract Operationalization.
3. Supplier Enablement strategy to be revisited.

children.name: Consideration Points

blocks.text: If Contracts, Catalog and Blanket Purchase Order spend is less then following can be considered:
1.  Adequate use Sourcing and Contract Operationalization.
2. Supplier Catalog (Static, Punch out) should be encouraged.
3. Every user in the organisation should be encouraged to use Guided Buying.
4. SAP Ariba Mobile application can be considered for PTP.

children.name: Consideration Points

blocks.text: If spend is less then following can be considered:
1.  Supplier Enablement strategy to be revisited.
